overview: Tap Dogs, the all-male Australian dance troupe, has taken the world by storm with a unique, blue-collar style of explosive and raucous tap. Conceived and choreographed by Dein Perry, the six inexhaustible Aussie dancers never miss a step as they stomp their way through this high-octane performance that includes a shape-shifting set, a huge foot-driven synthesizer and a gravity-defying dance number on the ceiling.
title: Dein Perry's: Tap Dogs
